name: Magical Grandma
description:
Mia Lee is a 15 year old high school student that loves to read manga. One day, after school, an earthquake happens and all of a sudden, monsters appear and attack her home! Not just that, but she also discovers that her grandma is a magical girl! Banding together, can they save their town before it’s too late?

Features:

  • Challenging boss fights with unique gimmicks.
  • Dialogue heavy story.
  • A family duo featuring:
    • Mia Lee, a hard-hitter that uses whatever comes in handy to gain an advantage in battle.
    • Cheryl Lee, a retired magical girl sprung back into action with her almighty powers of bloom.
  • An optional boss rush mode with an exclusive superboss.

Made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #7
